instructions: Open the Google Play Store app. Select My apps & games from the main menu. To update apps on Android, tap the Updates tab, then do one of the following: Tap Update All to update all the apps that have available updates. Tap Update next to a specific app. You may be asked to accept the terms of the app. Read the list of information the app collects or devices it accesses, then tap Accept to finish updating the app.

Open the Google Play Store app. From the main menu, tap Settings . To set up your device to automatically update apps, tap Auto-update apps , then choose how you want to update. Your options are: Over any network. Over Wi-Fi only. Select Done when finished.

Opening the Settings app. To check if you re using the latest version , tap either About phone or About tablet , then tap Software information . At the top of the list, you ll see the Android version.
